messages.messageBody:
About the over perscribing of Ritalin.
Note before a potental flaming: I understand if some find it
necessary for Ritalin. But as I said before, I also know personally
as a teacher's daughter that it is becoming increasingly
overperscribed to children who really don't need it at all.
Tracy

messages.messageBody:
----- snip----- And actually
> we are here to learn about unschooling and not to talk about what hubby
and I
> do in regard to our e-mail. Thank-you!>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

I didn't mean to offend you. I have never before seen email with two
signatures. That is nice that you are working as a team for your son.

I am also not familiar with seeing the subject of an email changed to the
name of a person. Typically, when people reply to an email, they leave the
same subject as the email they are replying to. That makes it easier for
people to go back through the archives and search for messages on particular
topics.

Mary Ellen
